verses.text: Blessed isevery one that feareth the Lord; That walketh in his ways.
For thou shalt eat the labour of thine hands: Happy shaltthou be, and it shall bewell with thee.
Thy wife shall beas a fruitful vine By the sides of thine house: Thy children like olive plants Round about thy table.
Behold, that thus shall the man be blessed that feareth the Lord.
The Lordshall bless thee out of Zion: And thou shalt see the good of Jerusalem All the days of thy life.
Yea, thou shalt see thy childrenâ€™s children, Andpeace upon Israel.
